data.name: Warplanes: WW1 Fighters
data.description:
Become a pilot! Immerse in WW1 aerial combat like never before in a captivating VR experience. Be a pilot during the Great War in Warplanes: WW1 Fighters. No matter whether you prefer arcade games or flight simulators – a variety of options will let you adjust the game to your preferences.

EXPERIENCE WW1 IN VR!
● Fully customizable flight models – from arcade to simulation based on aerodynamics.
● Additional options affecting gameplay – enabling manual takeoffs and landing, aggressive AI, disabling HUD and more.
● Realistic graphics and amazing performance (90Hz on Quest 2).
● 20 playable planes – from light scout planes to heavy bombers.
● Two campaigns with hundreds of missions set in diverse locations, seasons and time of day.
● Build a squadron – upgrade and customize your machines.
● Gain medals and upgrade your skills to manage your base more efficiently.
● Single-player, PvP and Co-op multiplayer modes.

changelog.change_log:
- New mode: Team Flare Mayhem.
- Selectable maps in multiplayer mode.
- All maps have been refreshed; cities, buildings, railroads, ships, etc. have been added.
- The cockpit of the aircraft includes a compass. In addition, in the Settings player can unlock the movement of the entire compass.
- The host can set the limit of respawns in a session as in Legacy Multiplayer.
- In Legacy Co-Op mode, the host can set the number of players.
- Various bug fixes and improvements.

- New mode: Team Flare Mayhem.
- Selectable maps in multiplayer mode.
- All maps have been refreshed; cities, buildings, railroads, ships, etc. have been added.
- The cockpit of the aircraft includes a compass. In addition, in the Settings player can unlock the movement of the entire compass.
- The host can set the limit of respawns in a session as in Legacy Multiplayer.
- In Legacy Co-Op mode, the host can set the number of players.
- Various bug fixes and improvements.

–  Character limit in user’s multiplayer nickname increased to 20.
–  Minor bug fixes.

- Multiplayer: host can change session settings for the next match after "Play again".
- Multiplayer: added "Allow Flares" session setting.
- Minor bug fixes.

• Player can change plane armor in the new Multiplayer.
• Fixed issue with built-in keyboard during entering the nickname.

• Updated graphics – new skydomes, improved terrain shaders and reflections on the plane.
• New, standalone multiplayer.
• Host can select which planes are allowed in the session.*
• Added favorite bar in the respawn window.*
• 60 new decals unlocked by ranks in multiplayer.*
• Friendly fire option available in the Team Deathmatch, Co-Op and Raid modes.
• 15 new maps available for PvP modes.
• UI and UX tweaks and improvements.

* Feature not available in Legacy Multiplayer.

- New multiplayer Challange mode.
- Bug fixes.
- Fixed crash after selecting emoji on the virtual keyboard.

- Multiplayer: active speech indicator.
- Fixed lost tracking issue.
- bHaptics support.
- Fixed launching the game on older system versions.

- Oculus Party support
- New multiplayer mode "Flares Mayhem"
- Planes management in the multiplayer session window
- Yoke position adjustment in the settings
- Bug fixes and minor improvements
- Multiplayer: fixed flags and remove bot buttons.
